Name: Toy - Cyan Light Stick
Description:
After using the item, Normal Attack Button is replaced with the Wave Support Stick Button.
Click the button to start waving the support stick, click the button again to stop. Click Exit Toy Button to restore the normal attack button.
Description$english:
After using the item, Normal Attack Button is replaced with the Wave Support Stick Button.
Click the button to start waving the support stick, click the button again to stop. Click Exit Toy Button to restore the normal attack button.
